import { Modal, useMantineTheme } from "@mantine/core"; import { useState } from "react"; function ProfileModal({ modalOpened, setModalOpened }) { const theme = useMantineTheme(); const {password,...other} = data; const [formData,setFormData] = useState(other); const [profileImage,setProfileImage] = useState(null) return ( setModalOpened(false)} >
